content.p: Participants are invited to submit an original research paper in their area of specialisation for oral / poster presentation. Topics available are such as food processing, food security, food engineering, food ingredients, product development, halal food, food properties, product quality and analyses, functional food, food chemistry, food biotechnology, food waste recovery and treatment, nutrition and health, packaging and storage, food microbiology, food safety, drying of food waste, valorisation of food waste, 3D printing of food, education and training and other related topics. Awards: Three (3) Best Oral and Poster presentation and other awards 22 and 23 June 2023 Cititel, Mid Valley Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia Local Fees: Early bird fees extended (before 3 April 2023): RM 800* (Normal), RM 500* (Student) Normal registration fees: RM 1000* (Normal), RM 700* (Student) International Fees: Early bird fees extended (before 3 April 2023): USD 250* (Normal), USD 200* (Student) Normal registration fees: USD 300* (Normal), USD 250* (Student) Participation/Accompany person: Local Fees: RM 400* International Fees: USD 200* *All payment are subject to 6% government tax. Please request for an invoice before making any payment.
